column3: Latest;(Phnom Penh): A------ military police officer was shot  at 12:55 am on October 12
column5: located in Toul Sangke II commune
column7: Phnom Penh.------The injured victim said that before the incident
column8: he was driving after two suspects on motorbikes who were trying to escape
column9: when one pulled out a handgun and shot the pursuing cop in the leg. ------The victim
column12: was immediately taken to Calmette Hospital.
column14: the police arrested a suspect and took him away to the Russey Keo district police station.------EDIT: The shooter has later been identified as a fellow military police officer
column16: who was trying to help out
